entry.def: Adulthood is the state of being an adult.

example.ex: Few people nowadays are able to maintain friendships into adulthood.
example.tran: 如今很少有人能将友谊维持到成年。

means.word_mean: 1. the period of time in your life after your physical growth has stopped and you are fully developed
2. the state (and responsibilities) of a person who has attained maturity

Sentence.sentence: The lengthening path to adulthood appears exacerbated (恶化) by parental involvement in the college years.

Regarding gender role building, social learning theories attach greater importance to socialization in one's childhood than in their adulthood or later life
Thus, these theories don't explain why gender roles can change in adulthood or later life.
